title: Coders Club Website (CodersHub)
description: Official website for Coders Club APSIT with 400+ members. Includes notes, blogs, projects, events, role-based permissions, and real-time updates.

title: Attendance Management System
description: Full-stack system to digitize attendance workflows with filtering, reporting, Excel exports, and role-based login.

title: Job Hunt - Full Stack Job Portal
description: Job portal with recruiter/job seeker dashboards, resume parser, job tracking, and secure auth with Clerk + Supabase.

title: JobFinder - React Native App
description: Cross-platform mobile app for job search with offline mode, push notifications, and geolocation listings.

title: Firebase Auth 2.0 - Template
description: Starter template for Firebase Authentication supporting Google sign-in, password reset, reusable UI, and error handling.

title: FitSwitch - Fitness Mobile Application
description: Android app with BMI calculator, heart rate monitoring, workout dashboard, and Firebase sync.

title: VibeX - Offline Music Player
description: Kotlin-based offline music player with playlists, RoomDB storage, and night mode.
